snippet: In a primary faceoff, Ohio voters chose Representative Marcy Kaptur, leaving Representative Dennis J. Kucinich without a position in Congress for the first time in 16 years.
abstract: Ohio voters, in a primary faceoff between two veteran Democratic incumbents, choose Rep Marcy Kaptur, leaving Rep Dennis J Kucinich without a position in Congress for the first time in 16 years; their district, the Ninth Congressional, was recently redrawn.
lead_paragraph: In a primary faceoff, Ohio voters chose Representative Marcy Kaptur, leaving Representative Dennis J. Kucinich without a position in Congress for the first time in 16 years.

headline.seo: After Ohio Primary, Kucinich Loses Seat in Congress
headline.main: For First Time in 16 Years, Kucinich Loses His Seat
headline.print_headline: In Primary, Kucinich Loses Seat In Congress
